name: Dungeon Conqueror (Milho Studio)
description:
game in development

Dungeon Conqueror is a roguelike where you need to win each dungeon to advance in the game.

buy weapons and armor, evolve your character, complete missions and defeat bosses to achieve the conqueror mode given by each boss.

The conqueror mode is what makes the Dungeon Conqueror, each mode has a different way of playing, a power and attributes.

download the demo for free and if you can help the developer

controls:

  • wasd - movement
  • P - attack
  • F - interact
  • L - transformation
  • Z - quick weapon change
  • X, C, V - potions or items
